remarks:
Alternate definition of the set of positive integers.  This was our original definition, before the current ~ df-nn replaced it.  This definition requires the axiom of infinity to ensure it has the properties we expect.  (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 12-Sep-2013.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 3-May-2014.) 

---

 Definition of the set of positive integers.  Another name for ~ df-inn .  (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 12-Sep-2013.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 3-May-2014.)
